name: cheerio-tree
description: **Cheerio Tree** is a powerful utility built on **Cheerio**, designed for efficient DOM parsing. It enables rapid conversion of **HTML data into JSON format**. When paired with **YAML**, it provides an intuitive and streamlined approach to data handling and transformation.

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run build:types && npm run copy && npm run clean-tests
scripts.publish:rc: npm run release && npm run build && git push --follow-tags origin main && cd dist && npm publish --tag rc && cd ../
scripts.publish: npx standard-version && npm run build && git push --follow-tags origin main && cd dist && npm publish && cd ../

author: sead
